translation.en: When I was in school already, I felt like I didn't belong here. I belonged somewhere else.
translation.es: Cuando iba a la escuela, no sentía que perteneciera ahí.

translation.en: Each time you come, you look from a different point of view,
translation.es: Cada vez que regreso, lo veo de otro punto de vista.

translation.es: para promocionar mis películas o el fisicoculturismo,

translation.es: Ese era nuestro patio. Era increíblemente hermoso.

translation.en: Our house was an old house.

translation.en: It was built in the beginning of 1800s.
translation.es: Fue construida a principios de 1800.

translation.en: Downstairs lived the forest ranger.

translation.en: We had the upstairs of that old house.
translation.es: Y nosotros vivíamos arriba.

translation.en: My mother was hardworking.
translation.es: Mi madre era muy trabajadora.

translation.en: Aurelia.

translation.en: She would never, ever pull back.
translation.es: Nunca se relajaba.

translation.en: She was a cleanliness fanatic.
translation.es: Era una fanática de la limpieza.

translation.en: I'm telling you, she was on her knees twice a week,
translation.es: Se ponía a limpiar el piso de rodillas

translation.en: scrubbing the floor.
translation.es: dos veces por semana.

translation.en: And then, when you open up the cabinet with the towels,
translation.es: Y siempre dejaba el clóset con las toallas

translation.en: it was perfectly placed.

translation.en: There was an edge.

translation.en: Bang. Bang. Bang.
translation.es: Cada borde.

translation.en: If my father would touch that,

translation.en: she would go nuts.
translation.es: se ponía como loca.

translation.en: This is what a fanatic she was.
translation.es: Así de fanática era.

translation.en: Growing up, I'll tell you what I learned.
translation.es: Aprendí una cosa al crecer:

translation.en: Work your ass off.
translation.es: debes trabajar duro.

translation.en: My father was the chief of the country police.
translation.es: Mi papá era el jefe de la policía rural.

translation.en: He was a tyrant and a very tough police officer.

translation.en: There was no screwing around.
translation.es: No andaba con juegos.

translation.en: My dad thought they should create some discipline in the house.

translation.en: He said you have to earn breakfast.
translation.es: Nos hacía ganarnos el desayuno.

translation.en: I had a very good relationship with my brother,
translation.es: Tenía una buena relación con mi hermano,

translation.en: but it was a competitive relationship.
translation.es: pero era competitiva.

translation.en: I mean, he was a year older, my brother.
translation.es: Era un año mayor que yo.

translation.en: More muscular, smarter.
translation.es: Era más musculoso e inteligente.

translation.en: He was very good in school.
translation.es: Le iba bien en la escuela.

translation.en: My father also made us compete against each other.
translation.es: Mi papá nos hacía competir entre nosotros.

translation.en: Who runs faster?
translation.es: Quién corría más rápido.

translation.en: Who picks more beautiful flowers on Mother's Day?
translation.es: Quién recogía las flores más hermosas para el Día de la Madre.

translation.es: Nos daba una hora.

translation.en: My brother would come home with his flowers.

translation.en: My father says, Meinhard, good boy. Very, very good.
translation.es: y mi papá le decía: Muy bien, Meinhard. Bien hecho.

translation.en: Arnold, next year you will try it again.
translation.es: Arnold, ya veremos el próximo año.

translation.en: So it was competitive. Even stupid things like that.
translation.es: Éramos competitivos hasta con tonterías así.

translation.en: My father gave me that drive he gave me that fire in the belly,

translation.en: and then with the message,
translation.es: junto con un mensaje:

translation.en: Whatever you do, Arnold,
translation.es: Sea lo que sea que hagas,

translation.en: be useful.
translation.es: sé útil.

translation.en: The way I grew up, it was very tough, even though it was beautiful countryside.
translation.es: Tuvimos una infancia muy dura, aunque viviéramos en el campo.

translation.en: But to grow up after a war…
translation.es: Pero crecer después de una guerra…

translation.en: What happens to your head when you come home from war
translation.es: ¿Qué estado mental tienen los hombres al volver de la guerra

translation.en: suffering the post- traumatic stress syndrome,
translation.es: con síndrome de estrés postraumático,

translation.en: like my father?
translation.es: como mi papá?

translation.en: He was buried underneath buildings, rubble, for three days,
translation.es: Estuvo enterrado debajo de los escombros por tres días.

translation.en: and on top of that, they lost the war.
translation.es: Además, habían perdido la guerra.

translation.en: They went home so depressed.

translation.en: Austria was a country of broken men.
translation.es: Austria era un país de hombres rotos.

translation.en: I think there were times when my father really struggled.
translation.es: Creo que hubo momentos en los que a mi papá le costó mucho.

translation.en: When we got smacked,

translation.en: or my father would use the belt and hit us.
translation.es: o cuando nos pegaba con la correa.

translation.es: Mientras fui creciendo y leyendo más

translation.es: sobre el mundo fuera de Austria, más empecé a sentir que había nacido en el lugar equivocado.

translation.en: I don't think that I was brought up in the right place.

translation.en: There's something off here.
translation.es: Algo se sentía mal.

translation.en: And I know this sounds crazy, but for a while,

translation.en: That's what convinced me that one day I have to be over there. I'm in the wrong place.

translation.en: The Thalersee, the lake, was a magical scene.

translation.en: This is Austrian.

translation.en: What the hell are you doing with weightlifting?

translation.en: And you're looking in the mirror when you train. What is that all about?

translation.en: Which means, like, into yourself.

translation.en: Where did we do wrong?

translation.en: In the beginning, Arnold wasn't a leader.

translation.en: He adapted to us.
translation.es: Él se adaptó a nosotros.

translation.en: But within a year,

translation.en: you get the impression that everything is easy and there are no problems.
translation.es: te da la impresión de que todo es fácil, de que no existen los problemas.

translation.es: Él fue el que reconoció el potencial de Arnold.

translation.en: Freddy Gerstl, the father, became kind of like a real big supporter.

translation.en: He said, You have to have not only just the strong muscles,
translation.es: Me decía: No solo debes tener músculos fuertes,

translation.en: like you guys are doing, but also you have to have a strong mind.
translation.es: Me decía: No solo debes tener músculos fuertes, sino también una mente fuerte.

translation.en: The body doesn't operate by itself. It operates because you give it direction.
translation.es: El cuerpo no funciona solo. Funciona porque le das dirección.

translation.en: He says, Remember one thing.
translation.es: Me dijo: Recuerda esto:

translation.en: That you can get an injury, and then all the athletic stuff is over.
translation.es: una sola lesión podría acabar con tu carrera de atletismo.

translation.en: You can have millions of dollars.

translation.en: Someone can rob you blind, and it's gone.
translation.es: pero alguien puede robártelo todo.

translation.en: But the only thing no one can take is your mind.
translation.es: Tu mente es lo único que nadie puede quitarte.

translation.en: Your brain power.
translation.es: Tu intelecto.

translation.en: Your mind, your will,

translation.en: is, in the end, much more important than the body.
translation.es: es mucho más importante que el cuerpo.

translation.en: He was the father figure quite the opposite from my father.

translation.en: Unlike my father, who criticized everything,

translation.en: that understood and he kind of smoothly would you in the right direction, rather than forcing you.

translation.en: I always hear this voice behind me saying,
translation.es: Siempre recuerdo que decía:

translation.es: Ten hambre de información.

translation.en: That's where Kurt Marnul was training.
translation.es: Ahí entrenaba Kurt Marnul.

translation.en: This weightlifting club became, for me, the mecca.
translation.es: Se convirtió en mi Meca.

translation.en: I became addicted to that, and so I went every day.
translation.es: Me volví adicto a entrenar, así que iba todos los días.

translation.en: When I walked into the gym, there was this wall that was wood.
translation.es: Al fondo del gimnasio, había una pared de madera.

translation.en: And then I would just take a chalk
translation.es: Me acercaba a ella con una tiza

translation.en: and I would write down
translation.es: y anotaba:

translation.en: bizeps,
translation.es: bíceps,

translation.en: trizeps, brust, rücken.
translation.es: tríceps, pecho, espalda.

translation.en: So I would do a set of biceps curls.

translation.es: y anotaba una línea en la pared.

translation.en: Then I would put another line and then another line and another line.
translation.es: Y luego ponía otra línea y otra.

translation.en: Then, the next one. Flies on the bench.
translation.es: Luego hacía aperturas de pecho en la banca.

translation.en: And I'd know when I did my 20 sets of a specific exercise.
translation.es: Así sabía cuándo había hecho 20 series de cada ejercicio.

translation.en: Now after three hours of training, this whole thing would be full of sets that I've done…
translation.es: Después de entrenar tres horas, la pared estaba llena de marcas

translation.en: …to get to that goal that I want go.
translation.es: para llegar a la meta que quería.

translation.en: The bodybuilding, there was, like, maybe, one or two events a year.
translation.es: Había uno o dos eventos de fisicoculturismo al año.

translation.en: Sometimes there were more than one competition a day.
translation.es: A veces había más de una competencia al día.

translation.en: Like, Mr. Steíermark, which means Mr. Styria.
translation.es: Como la competencia de Mr. Styria.

translation.en: And then there would be the Mr. Hercules competition,
translation.es: O la competencia de Mr. Hércules,

translation.en: which is usually for the guy that was the most muscular.
translation.es: que premiaba al competidor más musculoso.

translation.en: They would hire a local band that was really, like, hot.
translation.es: Contrataban a bandas locales populares.

translation.en: They would have women who were from some exotic place
translation.es: Y traían a mujeres de algún lugar exótico

translation.en: to give the sport of bodybuilding a better reputation.
translation.es: para darle una mejor reputación al deporte.

translation.en: Then, there would be a Mr. Austria competition, which is, of course, the national championships.
translation.es: También estaba la competencia nacional de Mr. Austria.

translation.en: ♪ Whoo! ♪
translation.es: MR. AUSTRIA JÚNIOR PRIMER LUGAR

translation.en: This was a place where I spent a lot of time,
translation.es: Pasaba mucho tiempo aquí.

translation.en: right here in this bed and in this room.
translation.es: En esta cama, en esta pieza.

translation.en: So I would be just literally, you know, lying here like this.
translation.es: Me la pasaba acostado, de esta forma.

translation.en: And just, you know, hanging here like this
translation.es: Pasaba el rato aquí

translation.en: and dreaming.
translation.es: y me ponía a soñar.

translation.en: And then looking up at those characters.
translation.es: Y miraba los pósteres.

translation.en: And then sitting up.
translation.es: Me sentaba en la cama…

translation.en: I would see Reg Park, you know, with his body,
translation.es: miraba el póster de Reg Park

translation.en: and then remembering the story
translation.es: y recordaba su historia.

translation.en: of him growing up in Leeds, in England.
translation.es: Había crecido en Leeds, Inglaterra.

translation.en: The town was like Graz. It was a factory town.
translation.es: Vivía en un pueblo que tenía una fábrica, como Graz.

translation.en: And the people worked hard.
translation.es: Y la gente trabajaba duro.

translation.en: And I said to myself, He made it out of that?
translation.es: Entonces, pensé: Sí él triunfó con una vida así,

translation.en: Then there's a chance for me also to make it out of here.
translation.es: entonces sí es posible que yo salga de aquí.

translation.en: Then you just look at any opportunity you could have to get out of here.
translation.es: Así que busqué cualquier oportunidad para lograrlo.

translation.en: So I think that's the reason I enlisted in the military early.
translation.es: Creo que por eso me enlisté en el ejército joven.

translation.en: In Austria, everyone serves in the military.
translation.es: En Austria, todos sirven en el ejército.

translation.en: I decided to go at the age of 18.
translation.es: Decidí ir a los 18 años.

translation.en: I wanted to finish my service and then move on,
translation.es: Quería terminar mi servicio y luego seguir adelante,

translation.en: because you could not get your passport unless you have done your military service.
translation.es: porque era un requisito para poder conseguir un pasaporte.

translation.en: I wanted to specialize in tank division and to become a tank driver.
translation.es: Quería convertirme en conductor de tanques.

translation.en: They said that's impossible. I'm too tall.
translation.es: Me dijeron que era demasiado alto.

translation.en: My father knew a few people in the military, so I became a tank driver.
translation.es: Pero mi papá tenía contactos, así que igual lo conseguí.

translation.en: Then I became the ballsiest tank driver that they had.
translation.es: Y me convertí en el conductor de tanques más osado que tenían.

translation.en: In the middle of basic training,
translation.es: Durante el entrenamiento,

translation.en: I got the invitation to go to this competition in Stuttgart, Germany.
translation.es: me invitaron a participar en la competencia de Stuttgart

translation.en: European's best- built man, in the junior division.
translation.es: del hombre con el mejor cuerpo de Europa, división juvenil.

translation.en: When I asked them, Can I go? they said no.
translation.es: Pero no me dejaron ir.

translation.en: I did not realize that when you're in the middle of the basic training, you are not allowed to leave.
translation.es: No sabía que no estaba permitido salir durante el entrenamiento básico.

translation.en: I went anyway.
translation.es: Pero fui igual.

translation.en: Twenty- eight guys on the stage,
translation.es: Había 28 participantes,

translation.en: and I win.
translation.es: y gané.

translation.en: I saw my career in front of me.
translation.es: Vi el futuro de mi carrera.

translation.en: I saw myself on that Mr. Universe stage.
translation.es: Me vi en el escenario de Mr. Universo.

translation.en: I just had to replace Reg Park's head,
translation.es: Solo debía reemplazar la cabeza de Reg Park,

translation.en: put my head on it, and stand there with the trophy
translation.es: poner la mía, recibir el premio

translation.en: and flex my muscles.
translation.es: y flexionar mis músculos.

translation.en: And I saw the thousands of people
translation.es: Podía ver las miles de personas

translation.en: in the auditorium, in the theater, screaming,
translation.es: gritando en el auditorio:

translation.en: Arnold! Arnold! Arnold!
translation.es: ¡Arnold!.

translation.en: I saw the fantasy,
translation.es: Vi la fantasía,

translation.en: and it's not a dream.
translation.es: pero no era un sueño.

translation.en: I said, No, fuck the dream. What are you gonna do with a dream?
translation.es: Pensé: ¿De qué me sirve un sueño?

translation.en: You have to have a clear vision.
translation.es: Necesito una visión clara.

translation.en: And when you visualize something really clearly,
translation.es: Cuando visualizas algo de verdad,

translation.en: you believe that you 100% can get there.
translation.es: consigues la confianza real de que puedes lograrlo.

translation.en: My very first impression was this is the most outstanding junior I ever saw in my life,
translation.es: Pensé que era el competidor juvenil más sobresaliente que había visto

translation.en: because he had it all.
translation.es: porque lo tenía todo.

translation.en: He had a kind of charisma very unusual for that age.
translation.es: Tenía un carisma muy inusual para su edad,

translation.en: He owned the stage already then.
translation.es: y dominaba el escenario.

translation.en: I talked to him, What do you think to come to Munich as trainer in the gym I manage?
translation.es: Le ofrecí un trabajo de entrenador en un gimnasio que tenía en Múnich.

translation.en: I was supposed to be in the military for three years.
translation.es: Se supone que debía estar tres años en el ejército,

translation.en: So I had to ask if I can leave early.
translation.es: así que tuve que pedir salir antes.

translation.en: That position that was offered to me
translation.es: El trabajo que me ofrecieron

translation.en: to become a trainer in a bodybuilding gym in Germany,
translation.es: para ser entrenador de un gimnasio en Alemania

translation.en: was very appealing.
translation.es: era muy atractivo.

translation.en: And it was kind of really the only solution
translation.es: Era la única solución

translation.en: to get me out of Austria and one step closer to America.
translation.es: para irme de Austria y acercarme a Estados Unidos.

translation.en: You're not gonna go and become the greatest bodybuilder of all time in Austria,
translation.es: No iba a lograr ser el mejor fisicoculturista en Austria.

translation.en: because you need to train with the best bodybuilders around you,
translation.es: Necesitaba entrenar junto con los mejores, y la Meca del fisicoculturismo estaba en Estados Unidos.

translation.en: and the mecca of bodybuilding was America.
translation.es: y la Meca del fisicoculturismo estaba en Estados Unidos.

translation.en: I got to get out of here, no matter what it takes.
translation.es: Tenía que irme de ahí costara lo que costara.

translation.en: I don't look at it as, Oh my God.
translation.es: No creo que haya tenido

translation.en: What a terrible upbringing I had.
translation.es: una infancia terrible.

translation.en: No.
translation.es: No.

translation.en: What I hated as a kid was good,
translation.es: Lo que odiaba de niño fue una ventaja

translation.en: because that's what drove me to get out of there.
translation.es: porque me impulsó a salir de ahí.

translation.en: All right, let's feed the girls.
translation.es: Bien, alimentemos a las chicas.

translation.en: Uno, Misty!
translation.es: ¡Jojo, Whiskey!

translation.en: Uno, Misty!
translation.es: ¡Jojo, Whiskey!

translation.en: I could train longer than anyone else.
translation.es: Podía entrenar más que nadie.

translation.en: I could go through misery when I traveled to other countries.
translation.es: Podía aguantar miserias cuando viajaba a otros países.

translation.en: I was able to do things that others couldn't do because of that.
translation.es: Y eso me permitía hacer cosas que otros no podían hacer.

translation.en: Ah, pushing him out of the way.
translation.es: Lo quieres todo para ti.

translation.en: It didn't bother me,
translation.es: No me molestaba

translation.en: because it was better than where I came from.
translation.es: porque era mejor que la vida que tenía antes.

translation.en: When I arrived in Munich,
translation.es: Cuando llegué a Múnich,

translation.en: my friend Albert Busek picked me up from the train station,
translation.es: mi amigo Albert Busek me fue a buscar a la estación,

translation.en: and I moved into the gym.
translation.es: y me mudé al gimnasio.

translation.en: There was a tiny little room,
translation.es: Tenía una habitación pequeña

translation.en: and my bed maybe was as big as the bed that I grew up with.
translation.es: con una cama como la que tenía cuando niño.

translation.en: All I had was a mixer that helped me mix my protein drinks
translation.es: Solo tenía una licuadora para hacer mis batidos de proteínas

translation.en: and a few clothes.
translation.es: y algo de ropa.

translation.en: That was it.
translation.es: Eso era todo.

translation.en: And I stayed there for at least a year.
translation.es: Y me quedé ahí por al menos un año.

translation.en: So, at any given time,
translation.es: En cualquier momento,

translation.en: I can go out and work out.
translation.es: podía salir a hacer ejercicio.

translation.en: I mean, how lucky of a son of a bitch am I to have the gym be my home?
translation.es: Era muy afortunado. Estaba viviendo en un gimnasio.

translation.en: I then developed my own little family,
translation.es: Luego cultivé mi propia pequeña familia,

translation.en: which was Albert Busek
translation.es: con Albert Busek

translation.en: and Franco Columbu, who I met the year before in Stuttgart.
translation.es: y Franco Columbu, a quien conocí el año anterior en Stuttgart.

translation.en: He was the perfect training partner,
translation.es: Era el compañero perfecto,

translation.en: and he was one of the very few Italians that spoke German.
translation.es: y era uno de los pocos italianos que hablaba alemán.

translation.en: He comes from Austria. I came from Italy.
translation.es: Él venía de Austria, y yo de Italia.

translation.en: And we started training together and having fun.
translation.es: Entrenamos y lo pasábamos bien juntos.

translation.en: Since then, I'm one of Arnold's best friends.
translation.es: Somos mejores amigos desde entonces.

translation.en: I messed it up.
translation.es: Me equivoqué.

translation.en: Say that again.
translation.es: Repitámoslo.

translation.en: ♪ Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa… ♪
translation.es: LONDRES

translation.en: My friends helped me to raise money for an airline ticket
translation.es: Mis amigos me ayudaron a comprar el pasaje de avión

translation.en: to compete in the Mr. Universe contest.
translation.es: para competir en Mr. Universo.

translation.en: So imagine, just a few months before, you're in the military.
translation.es: Estaba en el ejército hace apenas unos meses,

translation.en: And now you're traveling to London to go to the Mr. Universe contest.
translation.es: y ahora estaba en Londres compitiendo en Mr. Universo.

translation.en: My goal was to place in the top six,
translation.es: Mi objetivo era quedar entre los seis primeros seis,

translation.en: but I placed second
translation.es: pero obtuve el segundo lugar.

translation.en: with the age of 19.
translation.es: A los 19 años.

translation.en: I said, Oh my God.
translation.es: Pensé: Dios mío.

translation.en: If I'm winning second
translation.es: Si obtuve el segundo lugar

translation.en: as this little farm boy from Austria that has no experience,
translation.es: siendo un joven del campo de Austria sin experiencia,

translation.en: next year I'm gonna win!
translation.es: ¡el próximo año ganaré!

translation.en: Arnold was so gifted
translation.es: Arnold era tan talentoso

translation.en: that regular people, the fans of bodybuilding, knew this is the future.
translation.es: que los fanáticos del deporte sabían que este era el futuro.

translation.en: At the Mr. Universe competition,
translation.es: En la competencia de Mr. Universo,

translation.en: one of the judges was a man by the name of Wag Bennett.
translation.es: uno de los jueces era un hombre llamado Wag Bennett.

translation.en: And he'd say…  Arnold, you look fantastic. You look fantastic. It's absolutely marvelous.
translation.es: Me decía: Arnold, te ves fantástico. Absolutamente maravilloso.

translation.en: All this British stuff, right?
translation.es: Con su acento británico.

translation.en: He invited us to a dinner,
translation.es: Nos invitó a cenar.

translation.en: and he's a judge, so I thought, This is so unbelievable.
translation.es: Como era juez, me pareció una oportunidad increíble.

translation.en: My English was terrible then, so we always were laughing about it.
translation.es: Mi inglés era terrible en ese entonces, así que nos reíamos seguido de eso.

translation.en: Wag then said to me, Well, if you ever come back, you can stay with us.
translation.es: Wag me dijo: Si vuelves, puedes quedarte con nosotros.

translation.en: You don't have to stay in a hotel.
translation.es: Olvida los hoteles.

translation.en: The next year,
translation.es: Al año siguiente,

translation.en: Wag organized the competition
translation.es: Wag organizó la competencia

translation.en: and he paid for the airline ticket to fly over there.
translation.es: y me compró el pasaje de avión.

translation.en: So I was at the Bennett's house in London,
translation.es: Estaba en la casa de los Bennett en Londres,

translation.en: on 335 Romford Road.
translation.es: en 335 Romford Road.

translation.en: I remember it exactly.
translation.es: Lo recuerdo todo.

translation.en: And in walked Reg Park.
translation.es: Y, de pronto, entró Reg Park.

translation.en: Meeting Reg Park
translation.es: Conocer a Reg Park

translation.en: was, like, one of those extraordinary moments.
translation.es: fue uno de esos momentos extraordinarios.

translation.en: You see him in magazines.
translation.es: Lo veía en las revistas

translation.en: You see him in movies.
translation.es: y en las películas.

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, there he is.
translation.es: Y ese día lo tenía en frente.

translation.en: He just came from South Africa and he wants to work out.
translation.es: Acababa de llegar de Sudáfrica, y quería entrenar.

translation.en: And then we're working out together.
translation.es: Así que entrenamos juntos.

translation.en: I remember that he didn't even… he didn't even take off his sweater.
translation.es: Recuerdo que ni siquiera se quitó el suéter.

translation.en: And it was just extraordinary to see Hercules
translation.es: Fue extraordinario ver en persona

translation.en: that you saw in the movies, to see him in front of you,
translation.es: al Hércules que había visto en el cine.

translation.en: and then to have a conversation and to have him be so nice.
translation.es: Conversamos un rato, y fue muy agradable.

translation.en: He knew everything about me, because Wag Bennett told him.
translation.es: Lo sabía todo sobre mí porque Wag Bennett le había contado.

translation.en: To really motivate me, he said to me,
translation.es: Para motivarme, me dijo:

translation.en: If you win the Mr. Universe contest,
translation.es: Si ganas Mr. Universo,

translation.en: I'm gonna bring you down to South Africa.
translation.es: te llevaré a Sudáfrica.

translation.en: And I'm gonna have you do posing exhibitions. I'm gonna pay you for each positing exhibition.
translation.es: Te llevaré a hacer exhibiciones de poses y te pagaré.

translation.en: You can make some money there, and you're gonna see the entire country.
translation.es: Podrás ganar dinero y conocer todo el país.

translation.en: There's no room for mistakes,
translation.es: No podía cometer errores

translation.en: because I have to be Mr. Universe in 1967.
translation.es: porque debía ganar Mr. Universo en 1967.

translation.en: Wag would say, You gotta train your calves.
translation.es: Wag me decía: Entrena las pantorrillas.

translation.en: Your biceps are much larger than your calves.
translation.es: Tus bíceps son mucho más grandes que tus pantorrillas.

translation.en: The calves are skinny, and the whole proportion is off.
translation.es: Las tienes delgadas. Se ve desproporcionado.

translation.en: If you want to win,
translation.es: Si quieres ganar,

translation.en: you need to be fine- tuned and you have to have everything at ten.
translation.es: debes estar bien pulido y ser un diez en todo.

translation.en: Finally, it all came together.
translation.es: Al final, todo funcionó bien.

translation.en: And the winner,
translation.es: Y el ganador es…

translation.en: Arnold Schwarzenegger!
translation.es: ¡Arnold Schwarzenegger!

translation.en: At the age of 20,
translation.es: A los 20 años,

translation.en: I made my vision
translation.es: convertí mi visión

translation.en: become a reality.
translation.es: en una realidad.

translation.en: On that very same stage that Reg Park won it,
translation.es: En el mismo escenario donde ganó Reg Park.

translation.en: and I got exactly the same trophy that he got.
translation.es: Y recibí el mismo trofeo que él recibió.

translation.en: And exactly the way I envisioned it.
translation.es: Exactamente como lo había imaginado.

translation.en: All the people were screaming.
translation.es: Todos estaban gritando.

translation.en: I felt like, This is like a fairy tale.
translation.es: Sentía que estaba en un cuento de hadas.

translation.en: Everything falls into place.
translation.es: Todo sucedió como quería.

translation.en: Reg Park invites me to Johannesburg
translation.es: Reg Park me invitó a Johannesburgo

translation.en: to stay in his house.
translation.es: a quedarme en su casa.

translation.en: Do you know what that did to me?
translation.es: ¿Se imaginan cómo me sentía?

translation.en: I'm getting invited by my idol to go to his home turf.
translation.es: Mi ídolo me había invitado a su hogar.

translation.en: I met Arnold when he came here.
translation.es: Conocí a Arnold cuando vino.

translation.en: I was, uh, nine at the time.
translation.es: Tenía nueve años.

translation.en: He was very polite. He was well- mannered.
translation.es: Era muy educado y amable.

translation.en: He would wear sandals and socks, you know?
translation.es: Usaba sandalias con calcetines.

translation.en: Like a country bumpkin, so to speak.
translation.es: Como un campesino, por así decirlo.

translation.en: Lily- white skin. Everybody on the beach had a tan.
translation.es: Era muy blanco. Todos los demás estaban bien bronceados.

translation.en: I remember him almost being in awe,
translation.es: Recuerdo que se la pasaba asombrado,

translation.en: but my dad made him feel so comfortable.
translation.es: pero mi papá lo hizo sentir muy cómodo.

translation.en: My mother, you know, of course, made him feel so comfortable as well.
translation.es: Mi mamá también lo hizo sentirse cómodo.

translation.en: He immediately became part of the family.
translation.es: Se volvió parte de la familia.

translation.en: We'd go out to meals together every night and go to movies.
translation.es: Salíamos a comer e íbamos al cine todas las noches.

translation.en: What he really learned from my parents was how important family was.
translation.es: Algo que aprendió de mis padres fue la importancia de la familia.

translation.en: I think that impressed him more than anything else.
translation.es: Creo que eso lo impresionó más que todo lo demás.

translation.en: My mother gave Arnold some pointers.
translation.es: Mi mamá le dio algunos consejos.

translation.en: You know, he could do the basic poses, but there was no flow and transition.
translation.es: Sabía hacer las poses, pero sus transiciones no fluían bien,

translation.en: So she helped him put his routine together.
translation.es: así que lo ayudó a mejorar su rutina.

translation.en: Mareon was a ballet teacher.
translation.es: Mareon era profesora de balé.

translation.en: She taught Reg how to be more graceful on stage.
translation.es: Le enseñó a Reg a ser más elegante en el escenario.

translation.en: You couldn't get more two opposites. Ballet is all about grace.
translation.es: Eran perfectamente opuestos. El balé tiene gracia.

translation.en: Then you have bodybuilding, which is kind of blocky
translation.es: Y el fisicoculturismo es tosco,

translation.en: and not much movement.
translation.es: y no tiene mucho movimiento.

translation.en: I didn't understand it all,
translation.es: No lo entendía,

translation.en: but then, as time went on, I started utilizing what she taught me.
translation.es: pero empecé a seguir sus consejos a medida que pasó el tiempo.

translation.en: When I was a kid, I was shy,
translation.es: Era tímido de niño.

translation.en: and bodybuilding
translation.es: Y el fisicoculturismo

translation.en: was a sport where you had to perform.
translation.es: es un deporte en el que debes actuar.

translation.en: So I could learn it in my own way,
translation.es: Así que tuve que aprender a actuar

translation.en: to perform and to pose on stage.
translation.es: y a posar a mi propio ritmo.

translation.en: And people then correct you and say, you know, Smile more when you perform, and do this and do that.
translation.es: La gente me corregía, me decía que sonriera y otras cosas.

translation.en: This is how it slowly came about to become an entertainer
translation.es: Fue así que poco a poco me convertí en un artista

translation.en: and really enjoying the moment.
translation.es: y comencé a disfrutar el momento.

translation.en: In 1968, I went and competed at the Mr. Universe contest in London.
translation.es: En 1968, fui a competir en Mr. Universo en Londres.

translation.en: Every time they called out a pose…
translation.es: Si pedían una pose de bíceps,

translation.en: If I did a double bicep pose, I had the biggest biceps.
translation.es: notaba que tenía los músculos más grandes de todos.

translation.en: Then, when we turned around and do a back pose,
translation.es: O una pose de espalda.

translation.en: there's no one that's going to have this kind of a back.
translation.es: Nadie tenía una espalda como la mía.

translation.en: So I knew I'm gonna win.
translation.es: Así que sabía que ganaría.

translation.en: I win the second Mr. Universe title. I feel, like, at an all- time high.
translation.es: Cuando gané el segundo Mr. Universo, me sentí mejor que nunca.

translation.en: And I'm about to go back to Munich,
translation.es: Estaba a punto de volver a Múnich

translation.en: when I get a telegram from Joe Weider.
translation.es: cuando recibí un telegrama de Joe Weider.

translation.en: I said to myself, Oh my God.
translation.es: ÍCONO DEL FITNESS Quedé totalmente sorprendido.

translation.en: Joe Weider? He's like the godfather of bodybuilding.
translation.es: Joe Weider es como el padrino del fisicoculturismo.

translation.en: The trainer of champions since 1939.
translation.es: Fue el entrenador de campeones desde 1939.

translation.en: All of the guys that win Mr. Universe and Mr. World,
translation.es: Todos los ganadores de Mr. Universo y Mr. Mundo

translation.en: they have been trained by Joe Weider.
translation.es: fueron entrenados por él.

translation.en: And it says in the telegram,
translation.es: El telegrama decía:

translation.en: I'm inviting you to come to Miami to our Mr. Universe competition,
translation.es: Te invito a Miami a participar en nuestro Mr. Universo.

translation.en: because there was two.
translation.es: Había dos competencias.

translation.en: Weider started a Mr. Universe in the 60s in America.
translation.es: Weider creó la versión estadounidense en los 60.

translation.en: I didn't go back home. I didn't pick up any of my belongings.
translation.es: No volví a casa ni recogí ninguna de mis pertenencias.

translation.en: I called Albert and I called Franco and said, Look.
translation.es: Llamé a Albert y Franco, y les dije:

translation.en: I just got an invitation from Weider. I'm not coming back.
translation.es: Recibí una invitación de Weider. No voy a regresar.

translation.en: I'm gonna move to America.
translation.es: Me mudaré a Estados Unidos.

translation.en: Bye- bye.
translation.es: Adiós.

translation.en: ♪ I got the feelin' ♪
translation.es: AEROPUERTO JOHN F. KENNEDY

translation.en: When I came to America, I felt like…
translation.es: Cuando llegué a Estados Unidos, sentí que…

translation.en: …finally, I'm in my home.
translation.es: al fin estaba en casa.

translation.en: Then we got flew down to Florida.
translation.es: Luego volamos a Florida.

translation.en: I was absolutely convinced
translation.es: Estaba totalmente convencido

translation.en: that I'm gonna beat all the American bodybuilders.
translation.es: de que ganaría la competencia.

translation.en: Set me up as kind of, like, the new champion.
translation.es: Que sería el nuevo campeón

translation.en: Become the greatest bodybuilder of all times.
translation.es: y que me convertiría en el mejor de todos.

translation.en: He was acting so arrogant and cocky like the winner, but he wasn't in shape,
translation.es: Actuaba muy arrogante y petulante, pero no estaba en forma.

translation.en: because it was all about being big and, you know, size with him.
translation.es: Porque se enfocaba demasiado en el tamaño.

translation.en: And when they announced the fourth place, third place,
translation.es: Anunciaron el cuarto lugar, el tercer lugar,

translation.en: and the second place, Arnold Schwarzenegger.
translation.es: y yo me quedé con el segundo lugar.

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.es: Mierda.

translation.en: This can't be.
translation.es: No puede ser.

translation.en: I once was considered the unbeatable guy, and now, all of a sudden, Frank Zane won.
translation.es: Todos decían que era imparable, y me ganó un tipo llamado Frank Zane.

translation.en: This is terrible. I'm embarrassed.
translation.es: Fue terrible. Me dio vergüenza.

translation.en: I think he was just used to winning all the time.
translation.es: Estaba acostumbrado a ganar siempre.

translation.en: Landing in this country the first time, getting defeated
translation.es: Llegar a este país por primera vez y ser derrotado

translation.en: by, as his words, a chicken with 17- inch arms,
translation.es: por una gallina con brazos flacos, como dijo en ese entonces,

translation.en: that really bothered him.
translation.es: le molestó mucho.

translation.en: I was so devastated.
translation.es: Estaba devastado.

translation.en: I was lying there in the middle of the night in bed in this hotel room,
translation.es: Estaba acostado a mitad de la noche en un hotel,

translation.en: and I thought the world is coming to an end.
translation.es: y pensé que el mundo se estaba acabando.

translation.en: I'm in a strange country.
translation.es: Estaba en un país desconocido.

translation.en: I cannot communicate here.
translation.es: No podía comunicarme bien.

translation.en: I'm thousands of miles away from home.
translation.es: Estaba a miles de kilómetros de casa.

translation.en: And I just lost.
translation.es: Y acababa de perder.

translation.en: I just disappointed everybody.
translation.es: Había decepcionado a todos.

translation.en: So in my mind, the bodybuilding world was going to say,
translation.es: Creía que todo el mundo diría:

translation.en: Schwarzenegger is not what we thought he is.
translation.es: Schwarzenegger no es lo que creíamos.

translation.en: So fuck him.
translation.es: A la mierda con él.

translation.en: I cried the whole night.
translation.es: Lloré toda la noche.

translation.en: The next day, I said, Okay.
translation.es: Al día siguiente, me dije: Muy bien.

translation.en: You cried like a little baby, you asshole.
translation.es: Ya lloraste como un bebé, imbécil.

translation.en: And now, let's move on.
translation.es: Es hora de seguir adelante.

translation.en: And then Weider gave me an airline ticket to go to Los Angeles.
translation.es: Y luego Weider me compró un pasaje para ir a Los Ángeles.

translation.en: He's gonna take care of things and he's gonna get me an apartment.
translation.es: Se encargó de todo y me consiguió un apartamento.

translation.en: I wrote to my friends right away. I said, This is quite different.
translation.es: Les escribí a mis amigos: Esto no es lo que pensaba.

translation.en: I felt, like, totally helpless and alone.
translation.es: Me sentía totalmente indefenso y solo.

translation.en: The gyms that I went to
translation.es: Los gimnasios a los que fui

translation.en: were gyms where the best bodybuilders worked out.
translation.es: eran donde entrenaban los mejores fisicoculturistas.

translation.en: I come in there and I want to work out.
translation.es: Quise ir a entrenar.

translation.en: And there's guys that owned the gym, like, Vince Gironda, he owned Vince's Gym.
translation.es: Vince Gironda, el dueño Vince's Gym,

translation.en: He says, You're still a baby.
translation.es: me dijo: Aún eres un bebé.

translation.en: We have to get rid of a lot of fat on you,
translation.es: Tenemos que hacerte quemar bastante grasa,

translation.en: but you have a lot of potential.
translation.es: pero tienes mucho potencial.

translation.en: And I said to myself, What the fuck is he talking about? Potential?
translation.es: No podía creer que me dijera eso.

translation.en: Then I trained at Gold's Gym,
translation.es: Luego entrené en Gold's Gym,

translation.en: and Joe Gold immediately called me Balloon Belly.
translation.es: y Joe Gold me llamó Panza de Globo.

translation.en: I said, Jesus.
translation.es: Quedé sorprendido.

translation.en: I realized why it was so important to come to America,
translation.es: Ahí me di cuenta por qué era importante haber ido ahí.

translation.en: because they just have a whole different understanding
translation.es: Tenían una comprensión totalmente diferente

translation.en: of what it means being in shape.
translation.es: de lo que significaba estar en forma.

translation.en: I alone cannot accomplish anything.
translation.es: No podía lograr nada solo.

translation.en: I need help.
translation.es: Necesitaba ayuda.

translation.en: So I invited Frank Zane, the guy that I was beaten by,
translation.es: Así que invité a Frank Zane, el tipo que me derrotó,

translation.en: to come out to California
translation.es: a que fuera a California

translation.en: and to train with me,
translation.es: a entrenar conmigo.

translation.en: because I wanted to see firsthand
translation.es: Porque quería ver de primera mano

translation.en: what does he do to get this kind of a quality of a physique.
translation.es: cómo entrenaba para tener ese físico.

translation.en: And I stayed with him on a cot in his living room,
translation.es: Me quedé con él en un catre en su sala de estar,

translation.en: and we'd go to the gym and train.
translation.es: e íbamos al gimnasio a entrenar.

translation.en: Go to the beach. Take pictures for Weider.
translation.es: Íbamos a la playa y nos tomábamos fotos para Weider.

translation.en: I went back to Florida
translation.es: Regresé a Florida, renuncié a mi trabajo de profesor

translation.en: and resigned my teaching position and moved to California.
translation.es: Regresé a Florida, renuncié a mi trabajo de profesor y me mudé a California.

translation.en: And then, when I was training here,
translation.es: Y cuando empecé a entrenar ahí,

translation.en: especially in Gold's Gym, I felt like,
translation.es: en especial en Gold's Gym, pensé:

translation.en: Wouldn't it be great if Franco would see what's going on here?
translation.es: ¿No sería genial que Franco pudiera ver cómo entrenamos acá?.

translation.en: I mean, he was my close friend and training partner in Munich.
translation.es: Era un amigo muy cercano, y me ayudaba a entrenar en Múnich.

translation.en: I really missed him.
translation.es: Lo extrañaba mucho.

translation.en: But when Weider heard what his height was, he had no interest at all.
translation.es: Pero a Weider no le interesaba traerlo por su baja altura.

translation.en: So he kept saying, No, I don't want to bring over a little guy like that. Come on.
translation.es: Decía: No quiero traer a un tipo tan bajito como él.

translation.en: And then eventually Artie Zeller, the photographer, and I,
translation.es: Al final, entre el fotógrafo Artie Zeller y yo,

translation.en: we kind of convinced him.
translation.es: lo convencimos de traerlo.

translation.en: And from then, I mean, everything really picked up.
translation.es: Y desde entonces, todo se aceleró.

translation.en: Cinque, sei, sette.
translation.es: Cinque, sei, sette.

translation.en: - - What?
translation.es: ¿Qué?

translation.en: Sette.
translation.es: Sette.

translation.en: Otto.
translation.es: Otto.

translation.en: Nove.
translation.es: Nove.

translation.en: Dieci.
translation.es: Dieci.

translation.en: - - Okay.
translation.es: Muy bien.

translation.en: - That's hard. - I get it.
translation.es: - Es difícil. - Sí.

translation.en: - I get it. - Oh, Franco gets it.
translation.es: - Entiendo. - Franco lo entiende.

translation.en: - Okay, pick it up. -
translation.es: Bien, puedes ayudarme.

translation.en: In that area of building a community,
translation.es: Mi talento para crear una comunidad

translation.en: the talent of mine was actually better than my talent in bodybuilding.
translation.es: era mucho mayor que mi talento para el fisicoculturismo.

translation.en: Gold's Gym in Venice Beach.
translation.es: Gold's Gym en Venice Beach

translation.en: Bodybuilders training for championships went there to train.
translation.es: era donde todos iban a entrenar para los campeonatos.

translation.en: And then Joe Weider publicized it as the champions' gym.
translation.es: Y Joe Weider lo publicitó como el gimnasio de los campeones.

translation.en: - That nose will look skinny now. -
translation.es: Se te verá la nariz pequeña.

translation.en: My first impression of him was he was outgoing, funny,
translation.es: Mi primera impresión de él, fue que era extrovertido y gracioso.

translation.en: and always cracking jokes.
translation.es: Le gustaba contar chistes,

translation.en: When he was in the gym, he was focused.
translation.es: pero en el gimnasio se concentraba mucho.

translation.en: It was all energy, and we helped each other.
translation.es: Entrenábamos duro y nos ayudábamos.

translation.en: Now, Arnold was a great person to have in the gym when you're working out,
translation.es: Era genial entrenar con él.

translation.en: because just his presence made you want to work out harder just to impress him.
translation.es: Te daban ganas de entrenar más duro solo para impresionarlo.

translation.en: He was a perfectionist.
translation.es: Era un perfeccionista.

translation.en: You train together, help each other.
translation.es: Nos ayudábamos entre todos.

translation.en: You even help each other pumping up backstage with the towels, and you oil each other up.
translation.es: Hasta para calentar con toallas o aceitarnos.

translation.en: You put the oil on me because I cannot reach in the back. Someone has to put the oil on my back.
translation.es: No podemos aceitarnos solos, así que necesitamos ayuda.

translation.en: That's what you do. You help each other.
translation.es: Eso hacíamos. Nos ayudábamos.

translation.en: And then before you go out, you say, Good luck. I used to say, Good luck, and I'm going to beat you.
translation.es: Y luego les deseaba buena suerte porque les iba a ganar.

translation.en: I was never a fanatic about diet.
translation.es: Nunca fui un fanático de la dieta.

translation.en: It was Frank Zane and Franco Columbu who put my vitamins together.
translation.es: Frank Zane y Franco Columbu me preparaban las vitaminas.

translation.en: And then we would experiment with steroids.
translation.es: Y luego experimentamos con esteroides.

translation.en: Everybody in the bodybuilding field who is up there on the top is taking steroids.
translation.es: Todos los que están en la cima del fisicoculturismo toman esteroides.

translation.en: Maybe five percent of my progress
translation.es: Quizá el 5 % de mi progreso

translation.en: is from the steroids.
translation.es: sea por los esteroides.

translation.en: I had doctor's supervision.
translation.es: Tenía supervisión médica.

translation.en: You stayed with a very strict rule of doing it four months a year
translation.es: La regla era usarlos cuatro meses antes de una competencia

translation.en: before a competition, and then lay off.
translation.es: y luego dejar de usarlos.

translation.en: So I changed my eating habits and everything.
translation.es: Cambié mis hábitos alimenticios.

translation.en: I got really tanned.
translation.es: Me bronceé mucho.

translation.en: If your whole personality is to show off,
translation.es: Si tu personalidad está basada en presumir de tu cuerpo,

translation.en: you can't wait to show people what you have.
translation.es: no puedes esperar a mostrárselo al mundo.

translation.en: There were hundreds of people watching guys work out.
translation.es: Cientos de personas nos veían entrenar.

translation.en: I felt like I was living in the middle of a circus.
translation.es: Se sentía como vivir en un circo.

translation.en: So you were getting it all times,
translation.es: Siempre recibíamos la satisfacción

translation.en: the satisfaction of people watching you
translation.es: de que la gente nos mirara

translation.en: and saying, Wow, he looks incredible.
translation.es: y nos encontrara increíbles.

translation.en: It was the summer of '69.
translation.es: Era el verano del 69.

translation.en: I was working as a hostess at Zucky's Deli.
translation.es: Trabajaba como anfitriona en Zucky's Deli.

translation.en: He came over to me and he said,
translation.es: Se me acercó y me dijo:

translation.en: You are so sexy.
translation.es: Eres muy sexi.

translation.en: I need to ask you out on a date.
translation.es: Tengo que invitarte a salir.

translation.en: With a really thick accent.
translation.es: Con un acento muy marcado.

translation.en: Barely 100 words in his vocabulary.
translation.es: Apenas sabía usar 100 palabras.

translation.en: He was handsome. He was magnetic.
translation.es: Era apuesto, magnético

translation.en: He was charismatic.
translation.es: y carismático.

translation.en: He was just different.
translation.es: Era simplemente diferente.

translation.en: When he arrived for our date, I was watching the moon landing.
translation.es: Cuando llegó para nuestra cita, estaba viendo el alunizaje.

translation.en: So we watched it together. We took photos in front of the television.
translation.es: Así que lo vimos juntos. Nos tomamos fotos frente a la televisión.

translation.en: Tranquility base here. The eagle has landed.
translation.es: Aquí base Tranquilidad. El Águila ha aterrizado.

translation.en: After our first date,
translation.es: Después de esa cita,

translation.en: we saw each other all the time that we could.
translation.es: nos vimos siempre que podíamos.

translation.en: He created laughter everywhere.
translation.es: Esparcía alegría por todos lados.

translation.en: He was just so
translation.es: Eran tan…

translation.en: mesmerizing.
translation.es: cautivante.

translation.en: Barbara was the first time
translation.es: Cuando estuve con Barbara, vi por primera vez

translation.en: that I saw, through her, kind of how America celebrates Christmas,
translation.es: Cuando estuve con Barbara, vi por primera vez cómo los estadounidenses celebraban la Navidad

translation.en: because she would take me home,
translation.es: porque me llevó a su casa.

translation.en: and the family would just be so inclusive.
translation.es: Su familia me aceptó con brazos abiertos.

translation.en: It was the first time
translation.es: Fue la primera vez

translation.en: in my life that I ever celebrated a birthday,
translation.es: que celebré un cumpleaños.

translation.en: when Barbara's mother made a birthday cake.
translation.es: Su mamá me hizo un pastel.

translation.en: I never got a cake. No one ever sang Happy Birthday or anything.
translation.es: Nunca me dieron un pastel ni me cantaron Feliz cumpleaños.

translation.en: I don't know why.
translation.es: No sé por qué.

translation.en: It gave me another way of really appreciating the American way of life,
translation.es: Me dio otra forma de apreciar el estilo de vida estadounidense

translation.en: and to have a normal life.
translation.es: y de tener una vida normal.

translation.en: But with my family…
translation.es: Pero, con mi familia,

translation.en: The communication with my parents was not good.
translation.es: la comunicación no era muy buena.

translation.en: And my brother…
translation.es: Con respecto a mi hermano, lo borré de mi mente por años

translation.en: I kind of erased him out of my mind
translation.es: Con respecto a mi hermano, lo borré de mi mente por años durante mi etapa de fisicoculturista.

translation.en: for years during my bodybuilding years.
translation.es: durante mi etapa de fisicoculturista.

translation.en: I felt like I was creating my own life over here,
translation.es: Sentí que estaba creando mi propia vida aquí,

translation.en: and I wanted nothing to do with my past life.
translation.es: y no quería recordar nada de mi vida pasada.

translation.en: Joe Weider was interested in trying to figure out how does he sell me.
translation.es: Joe Weider estaba interesado en buscar formas para venderme.

translation.en: So he came up with this idea that I'm this German machine.
translation.es: Así que se le ocurrió la idea de mostrarme como una máquina alemana.

translation.en: No emotions, just marching forward,
translation.es: Una máquina sin emociones, imparable.

translation.en: and it's going to make me the champion.
translation.es: Creyó que eso me convertiría en el campeón.

translation.en: And I loved it, because that's what I saw myself,
translation.es: Y me encantó, porque yo me veía así.

translation.en: as someone that couldn't be stopped.
translation.es: Creía que nadie podía pararme.

translation.en: Joe Weider had one goal in mind, and that is that I win every competition.
translation.es: El objetivo de Joe Weider era que ganara todas las competencias,

translation.en: That I'm on the cover of his magazine.
translation.es: que apareciera en su revista

translation.en: That I sell a shitload of food supplements for him.
translation.es: y que vendiera toneladas de suplementos alimenticios.

translation.en: And that everything that I did,
translation.es: Y que todo lo que hiciera

translation.en: he would use the name Weider for it.
translation.es: estuviera asociado a su nombre.

translation.en: So when I came up with
translation.es: Así que cuando se me ocurrió

translation.en: splitting my bicep training with my tricep training,
translation.es: dividir el entrenamiento del bíceps y del tríceps,

translation.en: he called it The Weider Split Routine.
translation.es: le puso la rutina Weider.

translation.en: So that was the deal.
translation.es: Ese era el trato.

translation.en: I'm just gonna go over this.
translation.es: Repasemos esto.

translation.en: You should have unique pictures taken, Arnold.
translation.es: Debes sacarte fotos únicas, Arnold.

translation.en: Make it look different.
translation.es: Deben verse diferentes.

translation.en: I had to go and work with him and say,
translation.es: Tuve que acercarme y decirle:

translation.en: Joe, you're selling your products. You're making millions of dollars.
translation.es: Joe, estás ganando millones vendiendo tus productos.

translation.en: I want to also sell some products of mine.
translation.es: Yo también quiero vender productos míos.

translation.en: All I need from you is give me advertisement space in your magazine.
translation.es: Solo necesito que me des espacio en tus revistas.

translation.en: I wanted to make money and I wanted to turn one dollar into two.
translation.es: Quería ganar dinero. Quería convertir un dólar en dos.

translation.en: And I wanted to learn how to do that in America the American way.
translation.es: Y quería aprender a hacer eso al estilo estadounidense.

translation.en: I said to Joe Weider,
translation.es: Le dije a Joe Weider:

translation.en: Can you help me? I want to go to college to learn English.
translation.es: ¿Me ayudas a estudiar inglés?

translation.en: Then I wanna take some business classes,
translation.es: Puedo tomar clases de negocios,

translation.en: because eventually I may have to take over your operation.
translation.es: porque quizá luego deba hacerme cargo de todo.

translation.en: And he loved that.
translation.es: Y le encantó la idea.

translation.en: These are the new covers.
translation.es: Son las portadas nuevas.

translation.en: Let me see it.
translation.es: Déjame verlas.

translation.en: We don't want to put him on the cover. Come on, Joe.
translation.es: No queremos ponerlo a él en la portada.

translation.en: You told me one time that you're only putting Mr. Universes or Mr. Olympias on the cover.
translation.es: ¿No que solo ponías a místeres Universo u Olimpia en la portada?

translation.en: Joe?
translation.es: ¿Joe?

translation.en: Every time I want anything,
translation.es: Cada vez que ganaba algo, me preguntaba:

translation.en: I say to myself, Okay, now what's the next thing?
translation.es: Cada vez que ganaba algo, me preguntaba: Bien, ¿qué sigue ahora?.

translation.en: If you're always hungry, you're never really satisfied.
translation.es: Si siempre tienes hambre, nunca estás satisfecho.

translation.en: Because Reg Park, of course, won three Mr. Universe contests,
translation.es: Como Reg Park ganó tres concursos de Mr. Universo,

translation.en: Arnold has to break that record.
translation.es: tenía que romper ese récord.

translation.en: When people think, This is too much. For me, it was definitely not enough.
translation.es: Algunas personas se sienten satisfechas, pero yo nunca sentí eso.

translation.en: And then I wanted more.
translation.es: Yo quería más.

translation.en: My dad had retired,
translation.es: Mi papá se había retirado,

translation.en: but he decided to compete in Mr. Universe.
translation.es: pero decidió competir en Mr. Universo.

translation.en: At that time, my dad was 42.
translation.es: En ese momento, mi papá tenía 42 años.

translation.en: Arnold was 23.
translation.es: Arnold tenía 23 años.

translation.en: Someone told me, Do you know who else is competing this year?
translation.es: Me preguntaron si sabía quién iba a competir.

translation.en: And I say, Who? They said, Reg Park.
translation.es: Y me dijeron que era Reg Park.

translation.en: I said, Come on. This is impossible.
translation.es: No podía creerlo.

translation.en: I felt kind of weird to compete against my idol.
translation.es: Me sentí raro al competir contra mi ídolo.

translation.en: And then won.
translation.es: Y luego derrotarlo.

translation.en: When that happened, it was something really weird that happened mentally to me.
translation.es: Después de eso, me sentí muy raro mentalmente.

translation.en: I felt guilty somewhat.
translation.es: Me sentí algo culpable.

translation.en: That my ego got in the way or maybe I shouldn't have competed that year.
translation.es: Quizá debí dejar de lado mi ego y no competir ese año.

translation.en: To know that, as a 15- year- old kid, you were dreaming about that
translation.es: A los 15 años, soñaba con estar ahí.

translation.en: and you were idolizing it.
translation.es: Lo idolatraba.

translation.en: And now, all of a sudden, you become the one that others are idolizing.
translation.es: Pero ese año yo me convertí en la persona que otros idolatraban.

translation.en: I made this vision become a reality.
translation.es: Convertí mi visión en una realidad.

translation.en: My mind is just geared differently. You know, it's geared towards moving forward.
translation.es: Mi mente es diferente. Está orientada a seguir avanzando.

translation.en: What is the new thing?
translation.es: ¿Qué viene ahora?

translation.en: A new challenge. A new mountain to climb.
translation.es: Un nuevo desafío u otra montaña para escalar.

translation.en: Mr. Universe is a world championship title,
translation.es: Mr. Universo es una competencia mundial,

translation.en: but every year there's a Mr. Universe.
translation.es: pero si cada año eligen a uno,

translation.en: But who is really, then, the best?
translation.es: entonces, ¿quién es el mejor?

translation.en: So Joe Weider created the Mr. Olympia,
translation.es: Así que Joe Weider creó Mr. Olympia.

translation.en: where all the Mr. Universes and all the world champions competes in the Mr. Olympia.
translation.es: Donde compiten todos los Mr. Universo y campeones mundiales.

translation.en: If you win that, then you can call yourself the best.
translation.es: Si ganas eso, puedes llamarte el mejor.

translation.en: Pow!
translation.es: ¡Bam!

translation.en: Mr. Olympia!
translation.es: ¡Mr. Olympia!

translation.en: The year 1969, that was my first Mr. Olympia.
translation.es: Competí en Mr. Olympia por primera vez en 1969.

translation.en: It was a different league.
translation.es: Era una liga diferente.

translation.en: I competed against Sergio Oliva.
translation.es: Competí contra Sergio Oliva.

translation.en: I lost against him.
translation.es: Perdí contra él.

translation.en: He was better than me.
translation.es: Era mejor que yo.

translation.en: I gave him a big kiss on stage, and I said, Enjoy it, because this is the last time.
translation.es: Le di un beso, y le dije: Disfrútalo, porque ganaré el próximo.

translation.en: The next year I came back with vengeance.
translation.es: Volví con mucha determinación al año siguiente.

translation.en: I had to kind of make him the villain,
translation.es: Tuve que verlo como el villano

translation.en: to go and train harder and harder and harder.
translation.es: para entrenar más y más duro.

translation.en: I finally got the chance to confront him.
translation.es: Y al fin pude enfrentarlo de nuevo.

translation.en: I then pulled a little trick on him.
translation.es: Y luego le hice una jugarreta.

translation.en: We were doing pose- off after pose- off.
translation.es: Estábamos haciendo nuestras poses,

translation.en: And then I said to him, I think it's enough.
translation.es: y le dije: Debe ser suficiente.

translation.en: I think they must know by now who is going to be the winner.
translation.es: Ya deben haber decidido quién de los dos ganó.

translation.en: He says, You're right, and then he walked off.
translation.es: Y me dijo: Tienes razón, y se fue.

translation.en: And then I pointed at him, like, He's giving up.
translation.es: Y yo lo apunté, como si se estuviera rindiendo.

translation.en: So it was like a psychological little trick to kind of close the deal once and for all.
translation.es: Fue un truco psicológico para asegurar mi victoria.

translation.en: He turned around and said, You son of a bitch.
translation.es: Se dio la vuelta y me dijo: Maldito desgraciado.

translation.en: He was, like, really pissed off about it.
translation.es: Estaba muy enojado.

translation.en: In the '70s, I kept being driven to go from title to title.
translation.es: En los 70, seguí persiguiendo título tras título.

translation.en: I said, What's that?
translation.es: Le pregunté qué pasó, me dijo:

translation.en: He said to me… he says, Your brother died in a car accident.

translation.en: He was drunk driving,
translation.es: Estaba conduciendo ebrio,

translation.en: and that he was hitting a telephone pole.

translation.en: all of this, I think he could not sustain, that punishment.

translation.en: by nature.

translation.en: Nietzsche was right,

translation.en: that that what does not kill you, will make you stronger.

translation.en: my parents came for really

translation.en: So that's why I was quite surprised.

translation.en: My father acted a little odd.

translation.en: He was a little slower. He was sometimes slurring things.
translation.es: Estaba un poco más lento, a veces no modulaba bien al hablar.

translation.en: And so there was something off a little bit there.

translation.en: A few weeks later,

translation.en: I got a phone call that my father had a stroke.
translation.es: me llamaron para decirme que había tenido un derrame cerebral.

translation.en: I, uh, then took the next flight to Austria

translation.en: and then went to visit my father in the hospital.

translation.en: He was not able to communicate.

translation.en: You know, he needed a lot of medical attention,

translation.en: but I did not know is this something you can overcome or not.

translation.en: That I did not know.

translation.es: Bueno,

translation.en: when you're a person that has always a goal,

translation.en: that always has a mission,

translation.en: So I won, all together, 13 world bodybuilding championships,
